tasks.task: Participating in an environmental science senior secondary course.
subtasks: Listening to the course introduction.
Explaining the historical development of agriculture from primitive times to modern practices.
Discussing the impact of modern agriculture on the environment.
Defining sustainable agriculture and its objectives.
Describing methods of sustainable agriculture such as mixed cropping, intercropping, and crop rotation.
Discussing soil management techniques in sustainable agriculture.
Explaining the concept and benefits of organic farming.
Describing the process of preparing vermicompost.
Discussing integrated waste management practices.
Explaining the role of biotechnology in agriculture, including genetically modified organisms (GMOs).
Highlighting the benefits and controversies of GMOs.
